modShortDescription: This 7 Days to Die mod adds skill points as reward for completing each tier of the trader quests, making the trader quests more worth the risks for early game.
modDescription:
This 7 Days to Die mod adds skill points as reward for completing each tier of the trader quests, making the trader [quests](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-quests/) more worth the risks for early game. The skill points you receive are for after completing each Tier, not after each quest.

There are many mods that increase the number of [skill points](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-skill-points/) per level, but this mod is more balanced than other mods. We need more skill points in the game, but earning them must be a little more balanced.

* Tier 1 = 3 Skill Points
* Tier 2 = 4 Skill Points
* Tier 3 = 5 Skill Points
* Tier 4 = 5 Skill Points
* Tier 5 = 6 Skill Points
* Tier 6 = 8 Skill Points

## Low Progression Variant

* Tier 1 = 1 Skill Points
* Tier 2 = 1 Skill Points
* Tier 3 = 2 Skill Points
* Tier 4 = 2 Skill Points
* Tier 5 = 3 Skill Points
* Tier 6 = 4 Skill Points

## Mid Progression Variant

* Tier 1 =2 Skill Points
* Tier 2 = 2 Skill Points
* Tier 3 = 3 Skill Points
* Tier 4 = 4 Skill Points
* Tier 5 = 4 Skill Points
* Tier 6 = 6 Skill Points

## For Games Already in Progress

If you do not wish to restart your world, and have already completed some Tier quests for the [trader](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-trader/), type the following lines into the game console (Press F1 in-game)

**For each tier that you completed:**

* givequest quest\_tier1complete
* givequest quest\_tier2complete
* givequest quest\_tier3complete
* givequest quest\_tier4complete
* givequest quest\_tier5complete
* givequest quest\_tier6complete

Then go talk to any trader. Youâ€™ll get all the rewards including the skill points.

**[Download](https://docs.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1DPHuB7T-YnoVXw28QA2M-PZTcsSqqbI8)** for A19  
**[Download](https://drive.google.com/uc?authuser=o&id=1wq9WVsy4lIfhKsFSTzoK6q_PQYintSnY&export=download)** for A18  
**[Download](https://drive.google.com/uc?authuser=o&id=1mT5kujFPwGN3F91WdF8wBseoD_HtYwqd&export=download)** Low Progression Variant for A18  
**[Download](https://drive.google.com/uc?authuser=o&id=196ymB4V0lbJQw8fW0f2P04EKB7yq78G7&export=download)** Mid Progression Variant for A18

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/20098-epicspires-a19-trader-reward-system/).
